cBioPortal API Usage¶

Import Modules¶

[1]:

import pandas as pd

import api_tools as apit
import access_cBioPortal as cbio

Load cBioPortal API using Swagger¶

We define an object cbioportal, serving as our connection to the cBioPortal API.

Reference: cBioPortal “API and API Clients” documentation

[2]:

client = apit.get_swagger_api_client(url='https://www.cbioportal.org/api/api-docs')

Get Molecular Profiles¶

[3]:

df_molecular_profiles = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, "Molecular Profiles", out_path="molecular_profiles.csv")
df_molecular_profiles.head()

[3]:

0 DISCRETE Discrete copy-number calls from the RAE algori... None COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION prad_mskcc_2014_cna Putative copy-number alterations (RAE) False NaN True None None prad_mskcc_2014
1 DISCRETE Discrete copy-number data from targeted sequen... None COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION pan_origimed_2020_cna Copy-number alterations False NaN True None None pan_origimed_2020
2 MAF Targeted sequencing of various tumor types via... None MUTATION_EXTENDED pan_origimed_2020_mutations Mutations False NaN True None None pan_origimed_2020
3 FUSION Fusions from targeted sequencing via Cancer Se... None STRUCTURAL_VARIANT pan_origimed_2020_fusion Fusions False NaN True None None pan_origimed_2020
4 DISCRETE Putative copy-number calls derived from IMPACT... None COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION crc_nigerian_2020_cna Putative copy-number alterations (IMPACT341) False NaN True None None crc_nigerian_2020

Get Studies¶

[4]:

df_studies = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, "Studies", out_path="studies.csv")
df_studies.head()

Get Sample Lists¶

[5]:

df_sample_lists = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, "Sample Lists", out_path="sample_lists.csv")
df_sample_lists.head()

[5]:
category description name sampleCount sampleIds sampleListId studyId

2 all_cases_with_mutation_and_cna_data Samples with mutation and cna data (10194 samp... Samples profiled for mutation and cna None None pan_origimed_2020_cnaseq pan_origimed_2020

Get Cancer Types¶

[6]:

df_cancer_types = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, "Cancer Types", out_path="cancer_types.csv")
df_cancer_types.head()

[6]:
cancerTypeId dedicatedColor name parent shortName
0 aa LightYellow Aggressive Angiomyxoma soft_tissue AA
1 aastr Gray Anaplastic Astrocytoma difg AASTR
2 abc LimeGreen Activated B-cell Type dlbclnos ABC
3 abl LightSalmon Acute Basophilic Leukemia amlnos ABL
4 aca Purple Adrenocortical Adenoma adrenal_gland ACA

df_patients = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, "Patients", out_path="patients.csv")

cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(

)
